title: Bedroom Furniture Galleries logo
content:
I was wondering what font is used for the “B” letter in this logo. If anyone can help me out that would be great.

The link can be found here:

[http://tbfg.ca/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071231215247/http:/tbfg.ca/ "http://tbfg.ca/")

Thanks.

 [‹ "if..." movie logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20071231215247/http:/typophile.com/node/18801 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Bold sans w/triangular spurs - Base 9 {Forrest Vess} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071231215247/http:/typophile.com/node/40429 "Go to next forum topic")
author: nein

comments.content:
Possibly Edwardian Script with some bits surgically removed.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-edwardian-script/edwardian-scr...](http://web.archive.org/web/20071231215247/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-edwardian-script/edwardian-scr-alt-itc/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-edwardian-script/edwardian-scr-alt-itc/")
The rest is [Palatino](http://web.archive.org/web/20071231215247/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Palatino) – just for the record.
